title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 2 - Are The 49ers Trapped With Jimmy G., Nick Wright, Steve Smith Sr.
itunes:title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 2 - Are The 49ers Trapped With Jimmy G., Nick Wright, Steve Smith Sr.
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin breaks down why the San Francisco 49ers might be shackled to Jimmy G. Also, Nick Wright discusses how the Tampa Bay Buccaneers can slow down the Kansas City Chiefs. Plus, Steve Smith Sr. tells us why Deshaun Watson needs to decide if leaving Houston is the best move for him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
